seo.seoDescription: Solana wallets offer more than custody - they're the gateway to web3 apps and services. Create a custom solution or amplify your offerings with an existing Solana implementation.
seo.seoTitle: Solana Wallets - A More Powerful, Programmable Way to Blockchain

options.headline: Limitless Customizations, Connections, & Control
options.body:
Welcome to a more programmable, powerful way to blockchain.

Solana wallets offer more than custody–they’re the gateway to web3 apps and services. Create a custom solution or amplify your offerings with an existing Solana implementation.

options.heading: Unlock Programmable Money
options.body: Wallets built on Solana don’t just safeguard your assets—they unleash full programmability. Automate an open-ended array of advanced wallet functionalities, including subscription services, KYC rules, loyalty programs, and more.

options.rawHtml:
Solana's enterprise-ready token extensions make it easy to achieve regulatory compliance and advanced capabilities, no matter where you operate. Turn your wallet into a universal service hub that complies with complex, changing regulations—with all the benefits of blockchain.

  • Transfer Hooks let you enforce custom rules whenever a token moves between wallets.
  • Confidential Transfers leverage ZK proofs to keep your transaction details private.
  • Freeze and Seize an account’s token balance for law enforcement actions or token recovery, based on strict pre-programmed logic.

Access new forms of commerce, whether you’re most active online or IRL. Solana wallets can enable one-click interactions via QR codes or links, without third-party app involvement.

  • Solana Pay is an open payments framework that offers instant transactions, near-zero fees, and access to millions of merchants and consumers worldwide via Shopify.
  • Solana Actions and Blinks let you turn any onchain transaction into a link that can be shared anywhere on the internet.

Solana’s feepayer function lets builders sponsor transaction fees across a wide range of onchain interactions. The result? Easy onboarding and frictionless experiences for new and existing users alike.

  • Octane is a feeless transaction relayer that makes it easy to cover transaction costs on behalf of users, using any SPL token.

options.heading: Unrivaled Security
options.body: Solutions offered by Solana wallets offer unrivaled security and provide the end user with a seamless, integrated web3 experience.

options.rawHtml:
Intuitive key management solutions on Solana eliminate the need for seed phrases, email verifications, and passwords. Swap out manual safeguards for more secure, seamless web3 experiences.

  • Exodus Passkeys let you access and transact across multiple web3 platforms via passwordless authentication—all through one secure, user-friendly interface.
  • Dynamic offers a suite of tools for effortless wallet creation, login, and user 
  • management. Non-custodial, passwordless, with one-click fiat-to-crypto onramps.

Solana’s multisig wallets give you the control, security, and automation needed to manage digital assets in any online environment.

  • Custom Signatures: Lock down your assets with customizable multisig approvals, so transactions are only executed when the right users sign off.
  • Self-Executing Payments: Streamline operations by automating recurring payments like payroll, vendor payments, and token vesting schedules.
  • Transaction Limits: Set daily spend thresholds with different signing requirements, from passkeys for small transfers to secondary sign-offs for larger transactions.
  • DeFi Integration: Engage in wide-ranging DeFi activities, including swap tokens and yield farming—all within the backdrop of a secure multisig structure.

options.heading: Powered By the Solana Virtual Machine
options.body: The SVM provides the underlying infrastructure for Solana's secure, high-performance wallets.

options.rawHtml:
• Smart Account Architecture: The SVM structures wallets as independent, customizable accounts with their own data space—perfect for managing balances, tokens, and more.
  • Flexible Management: Seamlessly create, split, and manage multiple accounts within your wallet, tailored for specific assets or use cases.
  • Parallel Processing: Enable lightning-fast user services, with transactions handled simultaneously across accounts. 
  • Cost-Efficient: Enjoy consistently low transaction costs even in the face of unexpected high-volume activity.

options.headline: Build
options.body: Solana provides both new and experienced developers with everything they need to build their own custom wallet.

cards.heading: Just Getting Started?
cards.body: Solana’s Wallet Builder’s Starter Kit provides the foundational knowledge necessary to create your own Solana wallet.

cards.heading: Unpack the Essentials
cards.body: The Solana Wallet Guide gives a simple overview of different wallet builds, including advanced features, clients, and development environments.

cards.heading: Boost Your Build
cards.body: Kickstart your new build by launching through Backpack’s open-source codebase or another stand-alone wallet app.

options.headline: Buy
options.body: Access a wide range of pre-built, easy-to-embed wallets without sacrificing security or convenience. Our commercial solutions unlock new possibilities for businesses and independent developers alike.

cards.heading: Circle’s Programmable Wallets
cards.body: Launch in-app wallets capable of facilitating commerce on a global scale.

cards.heading: Dynamic
cards.body: Access a powerful toolkit for building custom Solana wallets and wallet-connected apps, within DeFi and beyond.

cards.heading: Exodus
cards.body: Leverage an accessible and secure platform for storing and managing a growing array of digital assets.

options.headline: Developer Resources
options.body: Ready to run your own Solana wallet? Here are a few example implementations to help you get started.

cards.heading: Hello World Wallet Guide
cards.body: An introduction to creating a Solana wallet frontend using Typescript and CLI.

cards.heading: Confidential Transfers Guide
cards.body: A guide to enabling private on-chain transactions through your Solana wallet.

cards.heading: Programmable Wallets Example
cards.body: A reference for creating a basic programmable wallet that uses web services for token transfers.

options.heading: Apply for a Grant
options.body: Ready to build on Solana? Turn your vision into reality with support from the Solana Foundation.
